Repeat: This action will repeat any actions added to it the number of times specified. You give the number of times that the actions are to be repeated and then add the action to the repeat loop, much as you would add an action to an "if", ie: dropping it to the side of the action rather than under it:

All actions added to the side will be included in the repeat and will be performed before the event or script continues with the actions added under (as shown in the example below). Note that you can end any loop prematurely if you call the Break action.
